data.title: FamCam and Minivan Entertainment
data.meta_description: Stay connected in the 2024 Chrysler Pacifica with Apple CarPlay®, Android Auto™, and Alexa support. Plus, keep an eye on the crew with the available FamCam.
data.text:
The 2024 Chrysler Pacifica comes standard with Apple CarPlay® support. Access Apple Music®, use your voice with Siri®, send messages, make calls, view maps and more.

Access over 200 channels of music, sports, kids’ songs and more on SiriusXM® with available 360L. Get personalized content, save your favorite stations and enjoy convenient mobile sync for seamless listening outside of the vehicle.

With Android Auto compatibility you can check the weather, view navigation, make calls, send and receive messages and listen to music—all from your Uconnect® touchscreen.

Keep yourself and the crew connected on the road thanks to Chrysler Connect and an available 4G LTE Wi-Fi® Hotspot. The whole crew can stream, browse, share and more. Subscribe to in-vehicle Wi-Fi with unlimited data for $20/month.
